overview:
Patrick joined Montagu Newhall Associates in 2008. Prior to joining Montagu Newhall, Patrick spent nine years at Grotech Ventures where he focused on early and expansion stage venture investments in technology and communications companies. Patrick was involved with several of Grotech’s portfolio companies including Advertising.com (AOL), USinternetworking (AT&T), iBiquity Digital, Hatteras Networks, BroadSoft, Fieldglass Software and Ziptronix.

Prior to joining Grotech Patrick worked in the Media and Telecommunications Investment Banking Group at Alex. Brown and Sons and its successors, BT Alex. Brown and Deutsche Bank, advising clients on a variety of M&A and capital markets transactions.

Patrick graduated from Princeton University with a degree in Politics and a certificate in Economics. While at Princeton, Patrick was a member of the lacrosse team that won three NCAA Division I National Championships.
